messages.title: WE NEED THIS ELECTION NOW
messages.content: We need this election now to secure the strong and stable leadership that the United Kingdom needs to see us through Brexit and beyond; to lock in the economic progress we have made together.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Our Labour, Lib Dem and SNP opponents

issues.brexitEurope: We need this election now to secure the strong and stable leadership that the United Kingdom needs to see us through Brexit and beyond.
issues.economy: to lock in the economic progress we have made together.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet argues that opposing parties are already seeking to disrupt Brexit negotiations and warns of uncertainty and risk for the British people, meaning higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste, and more debt.
